## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description        | Type                                                                                                                                            | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `height`  | `height`  | ApexChart height   | `number \| string`                                                                                                                              | `undefined` |
| `options` | --        | ApexCharts options | `ApexOptions`                                                                                                                                   | `undefined` |
| `series`  | --        | ApexCharts series  | `number[] \| { name: string; data: number[] \| { x: string; y: number; }[]; }[]`                                                                | `undefined` |
| `type`    | `type`    | ApexCharts type    | `"area" \| "bar" \| "bubble" \| "candlestick" \| "donut" \| "heatmap" \| "histogram" \| "line" \| "pie" \| "radar" \| "radialBar" \| "scatter"` | `undefined` |
| `width`   | `width`   | ApexChart width    | `number \| string`                                                                                                                              | `undefined` |
